Package com.karandev.io.util.console

Class Console

java.lang.Object
com.karandev.io.util.console.Console
public final class Console extends Object
Utility class for standard input, standard output and standard error operations.

Provides static methods for reading and writing various data types (primitive types, String, BigDecimal, BigInteger) from/to standard input, output, and error streams. Includes error handling and formatting support.

Copyleft (c) 1993 by C and System Programmers Association (CSD) All Rights Free

Author:
CSD Development Group

  • Nested Class Summary

    Nested Classes
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    static final class 
    Console.Error
    Nested class for writing various data types and formatted output to the standard error stream.
